page.title: 17Shops and Stalls - two
page.content: Along the A44 road through Wickhamford are several fruit and vegetable stalls.As you drive along these stalls are very noticeable because they have large blackboards with writing advertising what they sell.As this is a busy road each one has a large parking area so that vehicles can pull off the road.They have attractive displays of fruit and vegetables,all with the prices marked.Most of the produce is grown locally.These stalls are open all the year and although tourists often stop to buy things,most of the trade is local. On the{Bond Industrial Estate}are 23 units. There are many types of firms including kitchen furniture, a hi-fi manufacturer, a U.S. clothing warehouse, an inflatable equipment firm supplying dingies.
